list_messages.description: List messages in the user's mailbox with optional filtering.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of messages to return. Accepts values between 1-500

pageToken.description: Page token to retrieve a specific page of results

labelIds.description: Only messages with these label IDs

includeSpamTrash.description: Include messages from SPAM and TRASH

includeBodyHtml.description: Whether to include HTML body content in response

get_message.description: Get a specific message by ID with format options.

id.description: The ID of the message to retrieve

includeBodyHtml.description: Whether to include parsed HTML in return

send_message.description: Send an email message to specified recipients. Supports creating raw MIME messages and replying in threads.

raw.description: Entire email in base64url RFC 2822 format

threadId.description: Thread ID to associate message with

includeBodyHtml.description: Whether to include parsed HTML in returned body

delete_message.description: Immediately and permanently delete a message.

id.description: The ID of the message to delete

modify_message.description: Modify the labels on a message.

id.description: The ID of the message to modify

create_draft.description: Create a draft email in Gmail. Supports raw MIME messages and thread association.

raw.description: Email message in base64url RFC 2822 format

get_draft.description: Get a specific draft by ID, with optional HTML body parsing.

id.description: ID of the draft to retrieve

list_drafts.description: List drafts in the user's mailbox, with filtering and optional HTML body parsing.

id.description: ID of the draft to send
